item.title: [PI] Need help with vote for cash[updated]
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Hello, I am using Xammp for vote for cash following the tut there was an errir i think it is set up for hostgator? and I honestly know nothing about mysql, I did have a highscores & vote for cash at one point but that was with delta and over a year ago, now im using PI. I dont do TV, I will edit this with my error in a second

[code]<?php

/**

  • @author Stuart <RogueX | iVariable>
  • @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010
  • @comment fixed a few bugs
    */

/**

  • mysql database hostname
    */
    define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “localhost”);

[/code]

it was this part that had the error I know nothing about mysql so…

it also made my pserver very laggy when i put it server sided, no Idea why…

Read full topic
